description: Painter is an application that provides many features for creating realistic digital paintings and editing photographs. One of its features is scripts you can record to repeat common tasks, such as applying brushstrokes to a painting or effects to a photograph.
You can access your library of scripts through the "Scripts" panel in Painter. To access the panel, select Window → Scripts .

detailed_instructions: While Corel replaced the SCRIPTS format, you can still open a SCRIPTS file with Corel Painter . For example, to open a SCRIPTS file, select Window → Scripts , click the hamburger icon, then select Import Legacy Script Library .
